      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        This method initializes the customer screen. Populates the country combo-box, and clears the contents of the division combobox.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - the location.
        resourceBundle - the resources.

      • onActionDivision

        void onActionDivision​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method that determines the content of the division based on label and combo-box that will populate it after (all based on the selection).
        Parameters:
        event - the event of making a selection in the country's combo-box.

      • onActionAddCustomer

        void onActionAddCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Checks the validitiy of datas and redirects back to main screen if all fields are valid.
        Parameters:
        event - the method of event when clicking the save button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The exception that will be thrown in an error from fxml loader.

      • onActionCancelAdd
